titles.title: Christ the Lord Is Risen Today

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ the Lord is ris'n today, Alleluia! Sons of men and angels say, Alleluia! Raise your joys and triumphs high, Alleluia! Sing ye heav'ns, and earth, reply, Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Love's redeeming work is done, Alleluia! Fought the fight, the battle won, Alleluia! Death in vain forbids Him rise, Alleluia! Christ hath opened Paradise, Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lives again our glorious King, Alleluia! Where, O death, is now thy sting? Alleluia! Once He died, our souls to save, Alleluia! Where thy victory, O grave? Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Soar we now where Christ has led, Alleluia! Foll'wing our exalted Head, Alleluia! Made like Him, like Him we rise, Alleluia! Ours the cross, the grave, the skies, Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Hail, the Lord of earth and heav'n! Alleluia! Praise to Thee by both be giv'n, Alleluia! Thee we greet triumphant now, Alleluia! Hail, the Resurrection Thou! Alleluia!
